description: I have joined Rakuten as a full-stack developer in the Rakuten Mobile Ecosystem Department
details:
Wanting to discover a new working experience abroad, I joined Rakuten in Tokyo. I integrated the Mobile Ecosystem Department and am currently affected to the Mobile Services Team where I am developping REST services and internal websites

Skills and technologies involved:
- C# and ASP.NET WebAPI/MVC
- Node.js with Restify
- HTML5/jQuery/Sass

description:
As a CTO, I have set up the IT team (5-10 people), the IT infrastructure and the different development methods. I was in charge of the strategic decisions for the IT department and ensure that the IT could support the rapid growth of the company.

I also have mainly worked as a Back-end Lead Developer (PHP/MySQL, CodeIgniter) and as the main Android Developer using Java.
details:
Appturbo is a french startup specialized in Mobile Aquisition and is one of the successful App Discovery platform and was founded in 2011 with only 5 employees.

As a CTO, me and my team were responsible of developping the products and the technical tools needed for the company and its success.

The main product 'App of the Day' has today 30+ millions of users, the company has now more than 50 employees of 15 different nationalities.

Alongside our mobile applications, we developped powerful internal tools: CRM, prospection tools, optimization tools and Business Intelligence reporting tools. The objective was to simplify the work for all the other departments when possible and give them a lot of structured and coherent data to help them to take the best decisions.

I was also responsible of the architecture, technologies choices and also the sysadmin of our Linux servers

Skills and technologies involved:
- Android development
- PHP Back-end development. Frameworks: CodeIgniter, Silex, Symfony2
- REST APIs
- Scrum
- Software conception
- Linux System administration

description:
As a Software Engineer I have developed an Android application dedicated to students having work scheduling problems.

I also have worked on the conception of a professional software aimed to Industrial Products Designers. The software aimed to visualize and edit Conceptual Graphs
details:
ILObjects was a startup company affiliated with the LIP6 (Laboratoire d'Informatique de Paris 6). It collaborated with the AI departments to create software solutions based on those research works.

For example I have developped an Android application linked to a school intranet which could suggests ideal homework schedule for the student and were based on his strengths/weaknesses. The app used a specific learning algorithm created by LIP6 researchers that could adapt to the student during the year. Some specific constraints could also be applied.

Skills involved:
- Android development
- Java
- Machine Learning
- UI/UX

description: I have worked on the refactoring and the optimization of a syntax and semantic parser written in Python for an advanced chatterbot. This chatterbot used many techniques from Artificial Intelligence in several domains: NLP, Knowledge Engineering and Semantic Web
details:
AsAnAngel was a startup company specialized in Artificial Intelligence especially on Natural Language Processing.
During this internship, I learned the Python language to work on the core engine of an advanced chatterbot technology. This engine could extract a lot of informations from sentences written in English like detecting jokes, irony and various emotions.

The engine had an extensive use of various technologies and tools used in NLP: Ontologies modelling through RDF-OWL, lexical databases like Wordnet.

Skills involved:
- Python
- Ontologies modeling
- Natural Language Understanding
- Linguistics
- Question answering
